name: Desecrators
description:
Desecrators is a 6 degrees of freedom shooter where you must fight your way through levels filled with robot protectors for fetching that sweet loot.

Be sure to invite a friend so you can plunder together. Remember, robots have no feelings. With the living owners long gone you will hurt no one by helping yourself to a little treasure.

Featuring

  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Stashes of loots
  • Robots
  • Possible your buddy

Official Discord: https://discord.gg/STyjS3mSQw
